detail_desc: Short dungaree dress in soft fabric with adjustable straps with metal fasteners at the front. Lined at the top.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and terry hearts. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are in touchscreen-compatible material.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.
Fitted lace top with a scallop-edged V-neck, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Partly lined.
Dresses in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a gathered seam at the waist. One patterned.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam under the bust and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Playsuit in woven fabric with a decorative pompom trim and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, an elasticated waist and short legs with a lace trim.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with 3/4-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
3/4-length trousers in a crinkled cotton weave with an elasticated paper bag waist, decorative tie detail with glittery tassels, and straight, wide legs.
Wool scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x185 cm.
Bras in cotton jersey and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Nursing top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, short sleeves and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Straight-cut, airy cotton shirt with a collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and one inner pocket. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Super skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy with adjustable shoulder straps, press-studs at the sides and front and back pockets. Lined at the top.
Trousers in a softly draping, fine knit with a regular waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long, wide sleeves and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.

Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with lace details, a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Seam under the bust with pleats and a lace trim, and a seam at the hem with a lace trim and wide, pleated flounce. Lined at the top and with a short underskirt.
Swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Top in a soft, fine, rib-knit viscose blend with a double-layered polo neck. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and high slits in the sides for easier nursing access.

Short, sleeveless dress in soft, washed cotton twill with a V-neck and wide, adjustable shoulder straps. Buttons down the front, side pockets with a decorative flap and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a small frilled collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Inset ladder stitching at the top and waist, and long, trumpet sleeves with ladder stitched bands and ties at the cuffs. Lined skirt.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative covered buttons at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Top in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Coat in soft faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes, a soft shaft and covered block heels. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 8.5 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, hole embroidery and scalloped hems.
Jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded parka in cotton canvas with a detachable, unlined hood, print motif on the back and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap chest and side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Quilted lining.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and short sleeves.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Baby Exclusive. Shorts in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace trim at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and gathers at the back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric in a double layer with a wide flounce at the top.
Metal earrings, one pair with plastic beads. Diameter from 2 cm to 2.5 cm.
STUDIO COLLECTION. 5-pocket jacquard-patterned trousers in slub-weave cotton canvas with a regular waist, zip fly and gently tapering legs.
Short, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif, gently dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, flared sleeves and a smocked seam under the bust. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit joggers with a soft, brushed finish, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a zip in one side and wide, straight legs.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Flared blouse in double-weave organic cotton with embroidery at the top. Round neckline, a yoke at the top, long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, and buttons down the back.
Puffer gilet with a detachable, faux shearling-lined hood. Zip with a chin guard at the front, welt front pockets and a rounded hem. Lined.
Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Horn-shaped earrings with metal detailing and sparkly stone studs. Length approx. 4 cm.
Short, glittery skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.

Straight-cut blouse in soft silk with buttons at the top and a knot detail that adds life and texture to the front. Seam at the hips, long sleeves with a pleat, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Top in a soft cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded all-in-one suit in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, faux fur-trimmed, padded hood. Zip down the front with a chin guard, elastication at the back and reinforced sections at the back and knees. Small zipped pocket at the top, and covered elastication at the cuffs and hems. Reflective details. Fleece lining. The suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a round neck, print motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline, lapped shoulders, short broderie anglaise butterfly sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight organic cotton jersey.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with reflective details, a padded, detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, two inner pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Print-patterned wellingtons with a loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Three with a print motif.
